name: includeit
description: Preprocessor to include one JavaScript/CSS file into another JavaScript/CSS file.
author: Lars Jung <lrsjng@gmail.com> (https://larsjung.de)

scripts.cover: babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --dir coverage --report text --report html test/tests.js
scripts.check: npm run -s lint && npm run -s cover
scripts.precommit: npm run -s check && npm run -s build
